Key Match Events: Arthur Masuaku scored an excellent free-kick as DR Congo beat Guinea 3-1.
Mohamed Bayo scored a penalty to put Guinea in front.
Chancel Mbemba equalised for DR Congo.
Yoane Wissa put DR Congo ahead with a penalty.
Arthur Masuaku made it 3-1 in the 82nd minute with a free-kick from a difficult angle.
Post-Match Reflections: The DR Congo players and coaching staff celebrated wildly as they secured their place in the semi-finals.
Arthur Masuaku's goal was his third for his country in 26 caps.
Miscellaneous Highlights: DR Congo finished in second place in Group F, taking three points from their three group stage fixtures.
DR Congo beat Egypt on penalties in the round of 16.
